Package com.airs

Class Summary
AIRS_configure_remote Activity to remotely configure AIRS.
AIRS_general_settings Class to implement the general settings of AIRS, based on the HandlerUI interface class
AIRS_local Class to implement the local recording
AIRS_manual Activity to show the AIRS manual in a WebView
AIRS_measurements Activity to view the current measurements of the ongoing local recording
AIRS_record_tab Activity for the Record tab in the main UI, controlling the recording and managing the templates
AIRS_remote Service to implement the remote recording
AIRS_remotevalues Activity to view the current measurements of the ongoing remote recording
AIRS_sensorselection Activity to show the selected sensors to record
AIRS_settings_tab Activity to create the list of settings entries and allow for selecting the various HandlerUIs
AIRS_shortcut Activity to start a local recording via a launcher screen shortcut
AIRS_tabs  
AIRS_visualisation Activity to show an image button and information text pointing to the Storica app
Prefs Handles preferences (general and handler-specific ones) for AIRS
